short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to convert Zeplin px units to rem units. The extension will automatically convert the units as you use Zeplin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to convert Zeplin px units to rem units. The extension will automatically convert the units as you use Zeplin.
